name: Initial Prospect
description:
Initial Prospect

A kinetic energy based game made for the #VirtusJam

IN THE FIRST LEVEL, FIRST THE DIALOGUE/TALKING SHOULD BE COMPLETED AND THEN YOU CAN INTERACT WITH THE ENVIRONMENT.

Controls:
W,A,S,D - Move
Mouse - Look Around
Space Bar - Jump
E - Interact
TAB/Q - Toggle Gun Mode
Left Mouse Button - Shoot/Absorb/Grapple Hook
Right Mouse Button - Slow Down Time
Escape/P = Pause Game
